radiographic_examinations.findings: Thrombosis of the left common iliac, internal and external iliac, and common femoral veins.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: MRI of the chest with angiography

radiographic_examinations.findings: Recanalization of the proximal superficial femoral vein and otherwise unchanged.
No evidence of deep venous thrombosis.
Recurrent deep venous thromboses in the left popliteal and calf veins.
